lead_paragraph: Lloyd Sam opened the scoring in the 71st minute, Lamar Neagle had a late goal and assist, and D.C. United beat the Columbus Crew 3-0 on Wednesday night for their first two-game winning streak of the season.

headline.print_headline: Neagle Has Late Goal, Assist, United Beats Crew 3-0
headline.main: Neagle Has Late Goal, Assist, United Beats Crew 3-0

snippet: Lloyd Sam opened the scoring in the 71st minute, Lamar Neagle had a late goal and assist, and D.C. United beat the Columbus Crew 3-0 on Wednesday night for their first two-game winning streak of the season....
